Steve Mann

Founder & CEO

I am Steve Mann and I make wearables and SWIM.

Steve MannFounder & CEO

Not Steve Mann

Person

Kyle was Electromechanical Wizard at Active Surplus, Canada’s legendary hub for makers and the birthplace of the world’s first wearable computer made by Steve Mann. Before that, he led R&D at an educational robotics company delivering custom solutions to a wide range of clients.

Make With Us

MannLab Canada

MannLab researches, develops and commercializes the inventions of Professor Mann and his closest collaborators. MannLab is a global ecosystem, where creative visionaries of all kinds have come together to shape how humans and technology will interface for the next 40 years, and beyond.
